actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should pursue monetary policies to reduce inflation and facilitate economic growth.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee adhere to a long-run anti-inflation policy and work toward gradually reducing rates of growth of money and credit consistent with economic growth.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should pursue monetary policies to reduce inflation and facilitate economic growth.
